section.title: screens master list of Screens
section.para: To view the master list of available custom screens, select the "Screens" option. The following screen will appear:
The screens master list displays information on all stored screens, including screen name, description, order, and enabled status.
To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the window, returning you to the application desktop.
Opens window for adding a new screen to the screens master list.
Enables you to edit highlighted screens. The edit window is the same as that for creating a new screen—except that when editing, the fields will contain screen information.
Highlight a screen and then select this button to remove the screen from the master list.
Highlight a screen and then select this button to test the screen.
